114.content:
The two shadowy figures looked down at their new creation with pride. It had taken them thousands of years to build up enough power between the two of them to create the offspring. That was the problem with being a low level daemon, you could never get enough souls to gain enough power and when you did another daemon would just steal it from you and gain more power.

That's why these two figures squirreled away their collection of souls for many years and even relied on a third investor to keep their actions and power a secret. Though they didn't use their power just to create a new offspring, they also saved up enough to send it to the mortal world. Their offspring would then be free to roam and collect as much power as it wished, after all fresh souls were always more powerful than the dead's that made their way to this realm.

Their plan was risky as the daemon lords didn't like anyone traveling to the mortal realm without their say so and their local lord would surely destroy the couple if they discovered their plan. But if all went well their offspring would collect enough power from the mortal realm and would then be able to usurp the local throne and raise them to a higher position.

"I've made the arrangements, two humans, one of each gender, will be babysitting the child tonight", the third figure entered the room. "I was only able to conjure enough power to send the child to the mortal realm for 24 hours, so time is of the essence".

"24? You promised us a whole week", one of the parents hissed.

"I did, but I had to use most of the power to contact the babysitters, create shades to fill in for the parents and make an empty house looked lived in. It isn't easy tampering with the mortal realm", the investor explained.

"We didn't ask for any of that, we just wanted the child to make it to the mortal world, so they could gather enough power in the longest time frame possible", the other parent responded, furiously.

"Have you done this before?", the investor asked the pair, who just shook their heads. "Well, I have and the first time I did it the child was never discovered. The second time I made sure they reached an orphanage which resulted them in taking up too much power and they were destroyed the moment they returned to this realm. No this will work, two guaranteed souls and little risk for discovery, now offer your final guidance so we can conclude our business".

The guidance was something daemon's did with their offspring, they would give them advice on how to become the kind of daemon they wanted them to be.

"Kill the female, take her looks and steal the males soul during sexual intercourse and become a succubus a master of males in all dimensions", one of the parents offers.

"A succubus, really?", the other one questions.

"Why not, they are often overlooked allowing them to usurp power in a more subtle manner", they reply making the other daemon give them funny looks. "Okay they're hot alright", he confesses.

The second parent ignores that last part and gives the child their own advice. "Torture them slowly and painfully but don't let them die. The longer they suffer the more powerful you will become, only once they can't feel anymore pain then you kill them, become a brute".

"A brute? Really, you want to the child to become a big stupid brute!".

"Well it's better than becoming a manipulative, skanky slut".

The two parents begin to brawl before the investor picks up the child. "Ignore the quarrels and become choose whatever you want to be, personally I'd choose to become a trickster, shrink them, turn them into objects, destroy their bodies, bring inanimate objects to life to torture them but never destroy their souls, if you do that you will generate enough power to stay in the mortal realm forever and don't need to worry about fighting for power here".

"Hey", both parents stop brawling and look at the investor. "Only we're meant to give the guidance. We used our essence to create the child".

"Well what are you going to do about it? The local lord is on his way and is surely going to destroy you for your actions"

"You sneaky bastard, you set us up!", they yell as they charge the investor but scream in agony as they are detailed by a rune trap.

"Pay attention little one", the investor speaks facing the child towards their parents. "This is what happens when you try to usurp power beyond your station, I hope you remember this when you decide what kind of Daemon you wish to be".

The investor then teleports the child to the mortal realm. As it travels it begins to form thought and recalls the three types of daemons it was guided to be thinking long and hard about it it decides it would like to become

The daemon child musters all the power she can get as she casts a body swap spell on Amanda, it destroys all parts of the illusion, causing the house to revert to its rundown state of existence. She then opens her mouth which shoots our raw energy towards Amanda, invading her mouth. She stands there stunned and confused as her life essence is swapped between the two bodies.

The Succubus now possesses Amanda's body and soul, giving her a power increase, while Amanda is in the tiny red baby. Without her soul she feels no emotions though she knows what has happened and wants to be human again.

The new Amanda walks out of the room to see a confused John, he's obviously surprised that the house is in ruins. "What happened?", he asks Amanda as he spots her.

Amanda needed to play this carefully, she needed John's trust as she needed consenting sexual intimacy to restore her fading power and she only had a short time to do so, otherwise she would become a normal human.

11532.content:
“Here’s the place.” Amanda said as she put the car in park. John looked at the place, a small yet gorgeous Victorian home. John felt a little apprehensive, but Amanda insisted that the pay was several times more than she usually would make babysitting. So while John wasn’t thrilled, he knew it would be worth it later.

“Ah! Come in, come in!” Sarah’s father insisted. They walked up the steps, and upon getting to the top, they realized he was unusually short, at most no taller than 5 feet tall. His clothes appeared loose, but neither John or Amanda really thought much of it.

He showed then around their home, including Sarah’s playroom, which included many tiny houses, lined up as if they were a village, her bedroom, and a few other bits of their home.

After this tour, Sarah’s mother brought her downstairs. Similar to her dad, Sarah’s mom appeared shorter than the standard adult. Sarah was dressed in a yellow dress, and based on the tour, Sarah wore diapers and pull-ups still. She also wore black Mary Janes, which appeared to be scuffed up. While John and Amanda again thought it weird that both parents were short, they assumed maybe they married based on their height, and again dismissed it.

“Have fun, kids! Sarah can be a handful, so good luck!” They left, rather hastily.

“This seems.....odd.” Amanda said.

“Odd? Nuh uhhhhh!” Sarah responded. “I’m just a little girl! Here, come with me, let’s play!” Sarah reached her hands up, reaching for both of them. John and Amanda each grabbed a hand. When they did, they were enveloped by light, and passed out instantly.

——————————————————

When they awoke from it, they noticed they were in a neighborhood, but realized after a moment it wasn’t the same neighborhood. “John......we’re in the playroom, where that village looking setup was.” She said, nervousness clear in her voice. “What happened to us?” John asked.

Suddenly, they heard the ground shake. Into the playroom walked a colossal sized Sarah, now hundreds of times bigger than either of them.

“A-ha! You two woke up, Hehehehe. You’re my newest dollies! Now I can play with you as much as I want!” Sarah giggled.

“But how did you do this?” John asked.

“I gots magical powers! I can shrink or grow whatever I want to. So sometimes I let Mommy and Daddy our so I can get some new toys instead of them.”

“Instead...of...them?” Amanda asked.

“Hehehe, yep! I shrink them all the time to play with me! It’s fun, but sometimes I get bored with them or the others.”

“....what happens when you get bored?” John asked tentatively.

“All kinds a stuff! Some go SQUISH” as she stomped down her gigantic foot, knocking them on their butts. “Some go in here,” as she lifted her skirt to reveal the diaper, “some I eat, and sometimes I just let peoples go.”

“So then....what are you doing with us?” Amanda asked.

“Hmmmmm.....I know!”

Sarah decides that John and Amanda:

115321.content:
“I know just where to put you!” Sarah exclaimed. John and Amanda had a bad feeling, and moved to run. Before they could get anywhere, Sarah dropped her foot in the way. “Now now, be good dollies. Running away will get you squished or even more shrinky.” Stopped in their tracks, paralyzed by fear, they stayed in place. Sarah reached down and grabbed both of them.

“Time for dollies to go play in my diaperrrrrr!” Sarah said. “One of my favorite dolly games!”

“You can’t do this!” John called out.

“Silly dolly, don’t make me make you smallerrrrrrr~” she responded. John quieted down, afraid the magical girl would shrink him even smaller.

“In you go!” She lifted her skirt, revealing her gigantic purple pull-up that would be trapping the two of them. She opened the front and dropped them in, both landing on the padding, close to her private parts. “Hope you make it out! Some dollies die when I go pee-pee.” Sarah looked down at John and Amanda, terrified by that sentence, and closed the diaper on them.

——————————————

Inside the diaper, John and Amanda were shaken around by Sarah frolicking around the house, jumping around, sitting down, and occasionally rubbing the front of her diaper to press the captive babysitters closer to her body.

“Uh ohhhhhh, time to pee. Good luck, dollies!”

John and Amanda braced for it, as the gigantic little girl let loose her urine on the pull-up diaper. Both Amanda and John struggled, and held their breath for dear life. She must’ve had a lot of water, because the diaper was soaked.

“John, John! Are you okay?” Amanda called out.

“y-yeah, I’m okay. I’m glad you’re okay.” John replied, to Amanda’s relief. After that exchange, they felt the giant girl sit down, and then saw light again as Sarah opened the diaper.

“Yay, you did it!” Sarah giggled. “You’re some tough dollies. Buuuuuuut now I need a diaper change! And you’re the babysitters, so you’ve gotta change me!” Sarah declared.

Before Amanda could plead their case, Sarah interrupted. “Too small?? Silly dollies, you aren’t small. But, now I’ll have to show you small!” She reached into her diaper and grabbed the two of them. She held them in her hand, and again they were blinded by light and passed out.

They awoke to a bigger boom.

“HI DOLLIES!” Sarah boomed out. This time, they awoke in her bedroom. There was a dollhouse, a table with her diapers, and the general purple little girl’s room one would expect.

“DOLLIES THAT ACT UP BECOME BUG SIZED!” Sarah said. “AND YOU MEAN DOLLIES, MAKING A LITTLE GIRL CHANGE HERSELF. NOW THE DOLLIES GET TO PLAY AGAIN, BUT MY PEE MIGHT KILL YOU.” And Sarah reaches down, pinching both of them between or fingers, which held both of them easily. From there, she opened her diaper and dropped them in. “GOOD LUCK, DOLLIES” she called out, before closing the diaper up.

Every step Sarah took while Sarah continued about the house felt like an earthquake to John and Amanda. They knew this time they had to get out, because they barely survived for diaper when they were 2 inches tall, but at 1/8 of an inch in size, the odds of surviving in her diaper were significantly lower.

“How will we get out of this?” Amanda asked, frantically.

“I think our best bet is to hope she sits down again. If she does, at our size we can probably sneak out.” John said.

11532121.content:
John and Amanda were attempting to feel around for a way out of the magical girl’s gigantic purple pull-up. As they did, they began to get near the side flap, to potentially escape out of her diaper.

As they attempted to do this while Sarah played with some of her other shrunken captives, Sarah took notice to feeling them towards the side of her diaper.

“SILLY BUGGY DOLLIES.” They heard Sarah’s voice boom out. “DOLLIES DONT LEAVE MY DIAPER TILL I SAY SO!!” Sarah raised herself off of the ground, lifted up or skirt, and opened up her diaper to see her captives. “I HAVE TO TEACH YOU BUG DOLLIES A LESSON!!” With that, she plucked John and Amanda out of the corner of the diaper, and moved them back over to the center, even front of her skyscraper sized private parts. After getting one more look at the ant-sized people, she closed the diaper, and lifted on the sides to pull the diaper tight, pressing John and Amanda in, preventing them from moving. John and Amanda cried out in agony, their tiny bones being crushed between her body and her nearly airtight diaper, all barely audible to Sarah.

“BYE BYE DOLLIES, I GOTTA PEE SOME MORE!” And with that, Sarah peed the diaper, this time her urine blasting John and Amanda directly. She peed enough that her diaper began to leak. Once she finished, she opened the diaper. “DID THE DOLLIES MAKE IT??” Sarah pokes at the ant-sized couple, their bodies not moving. “GUESS I KILLED MORE DOLLIES. GOTTA FINISH UP!” Sarah squeezed the front of the diaper, crunching up John and Amanda’s lifeless bodies, that had already drowned by the blast of pee. She opened her diaper again, this time seeing two bloodstains inside the diaper. “Hehehehe, more bad dollies squished!” Sarah said with delight.

“And if any of your other dollies don’t do what I say, I’ll shrink the town and sit on you all!” Sarah called out to the shrunken neighborhood. They knew not to defy her.

———————————————

Sarah’s parents came home hours later, resigned to returning home. “Mommy, Daddy!” Sarah excitedly yelled out! She touched both of them, shrinking them back down to their usual sizes. “I needs a diaper change! My diaper leaked.” And so Sarah grabbed her doll sized parents and went to her bedroom. As they removed the diaper, they saw the dead remains of the ant-sized couple. The parents sighed, they knew their girl would probably kill them, as she had so many others.

The diaper got thrown away, likely not to be the last diaper to have crushed people in.

11532122.content:
After a while of their world shaking from inside Sarah’s gigantic diaper, they felt her stop, and shift towards the floor. Sarah’s butt landed down on what sounded like the playmat in the playroom. When she sat down, John and Amanda heard a crunching sound. “What....what was that?” Amanda asked. “OOPS, SQUISHED ANOTHER DOLLY UNDER MY DIAPEE! THIS IS WHY DOLLIES SHOULDNT TRY RUNNING AWAY!” Sarah’s voice boomed out.

She’s colossal!” Amanda insisted. “Hey, better odds out there where maybe some other shrunken person can help us than drowning in her pee like bugs.” John replied. Their odds looked bad, being 1/8 inch tall, but those odds were still better than staying in her diaper and trying to survive her using it.

After a couple minutes, they got to a small opening on the right side of her diaper. They climbed over the side flaps, and got out of the diaper. They emerged to see Sarah’s finger on one of the houses, shrinking it until it was under her finger. “BYE BYE OLD DOLLIES, NO MORE PLAYING WITH YOU.” The house and the tinies in it had been shrunken so small that John and Amanda we’re unsure if Sarah’s finger crushed them.

“Guess we gotta get to the town. Maybe another shrunken person can help us.” Amanda said. And off the two started towards the town of Sarah’s shrunken people.

1153212212.content:
John and Amanda awoke again, but noticed quickly that this house appeared different.

“We’re still small, I think?” John said, looking around.

“Yeah, I just wonder how small now...”

As they pondered this, a girl began walking towards them. She looked similar to their ages, but she towered over them even more than Sarah did. She walked directly towards them, clearly able to at least notice them. She stopped, sneakers stepping on either side of them. As they looked up, it appeared this girl was diapered as well.

“Ahhhhh, you two must’ve really pissed her off to be this small.” The giantess said. “If you’re about the size of mice to me, you are specks to her now.”

“Wh....what??” Amanda said, getting chills.

“Who are you?” John asked.

“Sorry little girl, but you two just got shrunken like waaaaaay smaller. For perspective, I’m only 4 inches tall.” She said. “Also, I’m Eliza. I was a babysitter for Sarah once, and now I’m her favorite dolly. She plays with me all the time.” Eliza answered.

John and Amanda both got saddened hearing this. Eliza was gigantic to them, and they were as bug sized to her as they were when Sarah first shrunk them.

“Isn’t there SOME way we can get big again! At this rate, she’s gonna make us microscopic, if she doesn’t kill us first!” Amanda said.

“Can you please help us?” John pleaded with the giantess.

Eliza squatted down, and dropped to the floor. The impact of her pull-up clad behind hitting the floor was enough to knock John and Amanda off their feet, which Eliza apologized for.

“Okay, so like, there’s a chance we can get you less microscopic at least, so you two have a fighting chance. But you’ll need to go into my diaper for it, so that way when she makes me bigger for my diaper change, you two can become bigger and figure something out.”

John and Amanda looked at each other, and agreed there wasn’t much of a choice. If at their size the other “dolls” would squish them, they needed a chance of surviving. They nodded, agreeing to go into Eliza’s diaper. Eliza lifted her skirt, revealing the pull-up, and put them in the front. “Hang on you two, we’re gonna need to be toyed with to get big again.”

Eliza went outside the dollhouse, and called for Sarah. “Miss Sarah, Miss Sarah! Are you ready to play?”

“MY FAVORITE DOLLIE ELIZA!! PLAYTIME~” John and Amanda heard the giant voice boom out. They then felt as Eliza was grabbed by the girl, currently planet sized compared to the two of them. “I hope this works...” John said, nervously.

When John and Amanda entered the house, they were greeted by the baby's parents. "We're so glad that you were able to come on such short notice, Amanda! My wife found your advertisement when we went to one of the new supermarkets that opened up recently" said the husband as he brought his wife close to him with one arm. "My name is Francis and this is my wife, Selena. We wanted to take time off for today since this is our 5th anniversary and we wanted to spend it away from home where we can enjoy ourselves through the night." The husband was dressed in a tuxedo while the wife was dressed in a very elegant evening gown. "You two look rather lovely!" said Amanda as she looked them up and down, rather envious of Selena's formal attire. Her hair was done in a way which put her long hair in a bun which dazzled in the night. She appeared to be truly remarkable and radiant, something that Amanda wish she had. "Well thank you, sweetie, and you two don't look too bad yourselves. You kind of remind me of myself when I first started going out with Francis." Selena looked back to the clock in the kitchen and noticed that it was starting to get close to 7 already. "Well, we better hurry along now. Oh! Before I forget I have to mention that there's some baby formula in the refridgerator and that little Seth's room is upstairs to the right, being the first door in that hallway. Also, another thing that I forgot to mention is-" she interrupted herself as her body suddenly shot forward a bit as if she was attacked from behind. "That our baby is the sweetest in the world and we would do anything for it and we jope that you take good care of my wittle Sethy-pooh!" Her body jumped forward again and she started panting. Francis put two fingers softly around her neck to check if her blood flow is normal. "Are you alright, dear?" Eventually, Selena calmed down and came back to normal. "I-I'm fine... anyways, I think I told you all just about everything you needed to know. We'll be home around midnight, so make sure to be careful. Goodbye for now." The middlee-aged couple began to walk towards their car and begin pulling out of the driveway. As they begin to make their departure, John and Amanda wave goodbye in their direction to send them off properly.
As they were walking into the house, John was scratching his head about what Selena said before they left "That was weird of her suddenly acting like that. Do you have any idea what might have happened there?" "Maybe she was just really passionate about her child. Almost all mothers are when they first give birth." 124.content:
John was sedately walking a decidedly unfamiliar sets of streets as he referred to a quickly scribbled note with a couple directions and a very basic map he'd drawn from his search online. There was still a certain air of disappointment and annoyance written all over his face as he took another deeper breath and sighed in his untold next attempt to calm down. Tonight him and his girlfriend of just a couple weeks were supposed to go on a date in town, instead of that he'd received a text message a couple hours ago telling him she had something come up and had to cancel. A couple texts exchanges later on the cell later and he'd learned something he didn't know about his girlfriend yet, she was apparently on a list of people to call in case of babysitting emergency in town.

He gave his cellphone another glance to read the last text he'd received from her and the note again, looking around at the part of town that was unfamiliar to him and specially the street names on the corner he'd just crossed, making sure he was still on track and not lost. At this hour most of the town looked about the same anyway, so it would have been easy to miss a turn. Rows after rows of nice little houses, with cars parked in the entryway, some with lights on and some not, and barely anyone walking around like he was. After their exchange, he'd managed to convince her to let him come along where she was babysitting, help if she needed any or just being there to pass time so it wouldn't be too boring once the kids were in bed. She'd caved in to his request, but asked that he didn't arrive before nine and be gone by midnight, midnight and a half. She had put those limits in, because she didn't want the parents to feel they had to pay extra for him being there, or for them to have to worry they did anything improper in front of the kids. Of course, he didn't had anything that terrible in mind, like you'd see in some movies. But he understood why'd she asked that anyway and had decided to go along with it without arguing too much about it.

Amanda had never babysat those kids before, but apparently they were gonna be looking after two little girls that were twins, seven years old from what he had been told. He didn't have that much experience babysitting at all, but what little experiences he had dealing with little girls from his family or friend's family didn't leave him with much worry about what could be. Unlike rowdy boys getting into all kinds of troubles and not wanting to listen to their sitter, little girls tended to play with their dolls and do their things after all, didn't they? He guessed some might be more troublesome then that, and he guessed that Amanda would tell him whether he was right to assume or wrong, if he asked her about it. But he wasn't really worried about it, even expecting the two girls to be in bed by the time he even got there.

He lightly folded the note and pocketed it, looking at the cell one last time before doing the same. He was past the time they had established as a limit and was standing in front of the two story house where she was supposed to be at, the lights were on but all the blinds being also down made it impossible to see what was going on inside. He gave the stone alley a little once over cursory look as he took the last couple breaths he needed to be fully calm, no need to scare children by being mopey he thought to himself, standing in front of the white door of the white little home. Before knocking a few times.

1242.content:
John felt a little uneasy after the fourth time he tried to knock on the door and tried to ring the bell, he could hear noises from the inside that seemed like people were there, not just TV sound either. Or at least he was pretty sure of it. But no matter how many times he tried to get someone's attention no one seemed to be coming to answer the door, he took out his cellphone and checked on the time again, sure enough he was minutes from nine and a half and should have been fine to come in.

He tried to see if Amanda would answer him if he sent her a text, so he sent her a little 'Are you at the babysitting place?' and waited a couple minutes but he didn't receive any reply from her. Same with trying to just up and call her. That wasn't like her to give him no sign at all, or at least that's how he felt and they had been friends for years before going out, so he felt like he could trust his instincts that something was wrong when she didn't reply at all after ten minutes of trying everything he could think of. He grumbled and looked around at the neighbourhood, nothing to really suggest that anything was amiss at any other houses, nothing to suggest that anyone might be watching him right now. Eventually, after he took another steadying breath to try and stay calm. He started to walk on the terrain of the little white house, carefully walking around the place and observing the windows, it being summer meant that there was a chance that one might be accessible and sure enough one was wide open in the backward.

It took John a couple minutes to walk around and look at everything, the one in the middle of the second story did seem to be his best bet, since it was so widely open. Of course, getting to the second story was another story altogether. "You know, Hilary's been awfully quiet tonight. Are you sure she's okay?" Amanda asks you, turning the volume on the TV down.
"Amanda, I love you baby, but you really worry too much! She's just a mopey teenager, I'm sure she's just up in her room listening to some depressing music or updating her blog about how much it it sucks to be her." You answer casually. You didn't intend to be mean of course, you'd just gone through the same phase before and were sure the very quiet, reserved, and somewhat secretive girl was just going through it too.
The two of you continue to watch TV, Amanda's head pressed to your chest as the movie played out. A few minutes passed before Monica shot up, as though someone had sent an electric current through her. "Did you hear that?!" She demands, scanning the area as though searching for something.
"Hear what?" You inquire, completely lost as to what she was referring to. Amanda fumbles with the remote and turns the TV off, leaving the two of you in total silence. "Amanda what are you-" She presses a finger to your lips, eyes wide with panic. Several seconds pass and not a sound was heard, causing you brush her hand aside. "Seriously Amanda, you're jumping at shadows right now. Everything is-"
You heard it too. It was very faint, but very clear as well. A voice, one belonging to a young woman, calling "Help!" emanating through the floor. Springing to your feet you and Amanda immediately sprint for the basement door, panic setting in as the voice continued to cry for aid. Twisting the knob a few times you quickly realize that the door is locked. You soon realize, much to you and your girlfriend's confusion, that there isn't only one voice, nor do any of the voices belong to the young teen the two of you were baby sitting. info.brief_description: It's date night for a young couple until one of them gets a job babysitting.
info.description:
The Story:

It's date night and you have big plans with your girlfriend tonight until you get a call saying that she got a babysitting job too good to pass up. Rather than spend the night alone you choose to help her out. However the child / children have something magical or strange about them and are looking for a bit of fun.

Characters:

John: 18, http://postimg.org/image/rvghsjieb/.

Amanda: 18, http://postimg.org/image/nz47xlrid/

More characters maybe added once Amanda and John have finished babysitting.

Rules

- Death of either John or Amanda is okay
- Always end in multiple choice, if you don't know what to put please write reader's choice or something else, ending the story is okay

Stories involving magic
All chapters involving magic follow these guidelines

Magic:
1. A magic user can not cast a spell on another magic user
2. A magic user can not undo the spell of another magic user
3. Wards can be placed on items or people to deflect spells back at the user having them take the affect instead
4. Any curse placed on a magic user that predates them getting their power still works but it may have unforeseen results

Universe:
This story takes place in the same universe as "Invalid Item" , "Invalid Item"  and "Invalid Item" 

If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to email me.

I Hope you enjoy and have fun writing.
